name: ProviderWhoReferredThePatientReceivedTheReport
title: Provider Who Referred the Patient Received the Report
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Care Coordination),(Data Element Scope: HCPCS G code: "Provider who referred the patient to another provider received the report from the provider to whom the patient was referred"),(Inclusion Criteria: Provides way to document the referral loop was closed.),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)

concept.display: Provider who referred the patient to another provider received a report from the provider to whom the patient was referred

contains.display: Clinician who referred the patient to another clinician received a report from the clinician to whom the patient was referred
